name: AnimatedViews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Animated Views is your home for daily news, reviews, and interviews from the world of animation. Now you can hear the latest headlines as part of your Flash Briefing.

Find links to the full stories in your Alexa app. And visit Animated Views online at http://AnimatedViews.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
